name: Life of Karel
description:
Have you ever wanted to see how game of life matches against the "Robot Karel" game?

You are stranded in the middle of space, because your rocket run out of fuel.

Luckily, you have a friend who can help you, your personal space computer! She (yes, the computer) found stray canisters of fuel on asteroids,
but it seems that they are populated with alien lifeforms, resembling a mold, which is not very friendly, but
it seems to be growing in some sort of observable patterns.

You have to collect the fuel, and then you can leave and go home.

Simple as that.

Turn based game, where you can move around the map, and avoid alien lifeforms growing as a mold in "game of life" style.

(Game is packed by https://enigmaprotector.com/en/aboutvb.html which may be  recognized as suspicious by Avast antivirus)
